meanings.definition: Resembling or related to a salmon.
meanings.sent1: The pink color of the salmonoid fish was beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The river was full of salmonoid creatures swimming upstream.
meanings.sent3: The salmonoid fish decided to wear a tiny crown for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her hair shone like the scales of a salmonoid under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The chef's apron was splattered with the juices of the salmonoid fillet.

meanings.definition: A fish of the salmon family.
meanings.sent1: I caught a salmonoid while fishing in the river.
meanings.sent2: The salmonoid leaped gracefully out of the water.
meanings.sent3: The salmonoid fish told a joke to the trout.
meanings.sent4: The salmonoid swam swiftly through the clear stream.
meanings.sent5: The children watched in awe as the salmonoid made its way upstream.
